Title: Trunk Music
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (written for television by), Joe Gonzalez (story editor), Tom Bernardo (staff writer), Chris Wu (script coordinator)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Sarah Clarke
Plot: LAPD homicide detective Harry Bosch is back on the job after a suspension. When a dead body found in the trunk of a car on Mulholland Drive appears to have mob connections, Bosch takes on a...
